channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Talk therapy is up, and use of psych meds without therapy is down, a study finds
item.description: A study from the American Journal of Psychiatry suggests that psychotherapy is becoming more accessible to people. The study looks at trends in mental...

item.title: Why midwives are worried
item.description: In Chad, they're a key force in addressing the country's high rate of maternal mortality. But U.S. aid cuts have affected their salaries.

item.title: With disability rights under attack, history offers hope and a possible playbook

item.title: Why Israel plans to limit life-saving aid into Gaza. And, Diddy's trial begins today
item.description: Israel's cabinet approved a plan to limit the way life-saving aid is distributed in Gaza. And, Diddy's trial begins today wth jury selection.

item.title: Jury selection in Sean 'Diddy' Combs sex trafficking trial begins today

item.title: In battle against transgender rights, Trump targets HUD’s housing policies
Trump says non-US movies to be hit with 100% tariffs
item.description: The president blamed foreign-made movies for the American film industry's "very fast death".

item.title: Ancient Indian skeleton still waiting for home
item.description: The find could shed light on how Indians lived 1,000 years ago - but is without a museum because of red tape.

item.title: Israeli officials detail plans to seize all of Gaza and occupy it indefinitely, AP reports
item.description: Israeli officials told The Associated Press that a new plan has been approved by its Cabinet to seize all territory in Gaza and occupy it indefinitely...

item.title: Borrowers caught off guard as student loan collections restart: "Every week is hard"

item.title: Will mortgage rates fall after this week's Fed meeting?
item.description: Could mortgage interest rates decline again after this week's Federal Reserve meeting? Here's what to consider.

item.title: Israel security cabinet approves plan to 'capture' Gaza, official says
item.description: The Israeli military has called up tens of thousands of reservists, saying it is aiming to increase pressure on Hamas.

item.title: Flight delays at Newark airport as labor shortages persist
item.description: There are hundreds of delays at Newark Liberty International Airport in New Jersey as labor shortages persist. CBS News' Kris Van Cleave reports.

item.title: Mexican mayor arrested over alleged links to cartel training camp
item.description: The mayor of Teuchitlán is suspected of colluding with the New Generation Jalisco Cartel, which he denies.

item.title: Indigenous people raise awareness about their missing and murdered

item.description: The National High School Ethics Bowl has just concluded its competition at the University of North Carolina, Chapel Hill.

item.title: Popemobile to become health clinic for Gaza children
item.description: One of the famous vehicles is being refitted as a frontline clinic on wheels, following a request by the late pontiff.
